name: Fishman-ia
description:
NOTE: I accidentaly deleted Windows build on game page and due to BrackeysJam rules I cannot upload builds until voting is over. Use web build instead. Sorry for that.

Made within BrackeysJam 2021.2 for 7 days.

Went fishing, caight the monster.

As the young diver face cute and terrible monsters of deep blue.

With your trusty rod.

And bag of useful items

Credits:

Cave theme — https://opengameart.org/content/ch-ay-na

Magma theme — https://opengameart.org/content/fire-level

Abyss theme — https://opengameart.org/content/great-boss

Shop theme — https://opengameart.org/content/talking-cute-chiptune

Sound effects — https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style
